articles.image_title: DIESES FOTO WIRD VON DER RUSSISCHEN STAATSAGENTUR TASS ZUR VERFÜGUNG GESTELLT. [REPUBLIC OF NORTH OSSETIA-ALANIA, RUSSIA - SEPTEMBER 28, 2022: People and cars are seen near the Verkhny Lars checkpoint on the Russian-Georgian border. According to the Russian Interior Ministry, over the period between September 17 and 26, about 78,000 Russian nationals entered Georgia, over 62,000 returned. The North Ossetian authorities are planning to restrict access of non-residential motor vehicles to the republic. Mobile task groups of draft and law enforcement officials are positioned at entrances to the republic and the Verkhny Lars checkpoint on the Russian-Georgian border to hand out draft notices. Russian President Putin announced partial military mobilization in Russia on September 21. Valery Sharifulin/TASS]
articles.author: 7 Min
